breadcrumbs.title: Samsung Solve for Tomorrow: Future Talks

text: Welcome to Solve for Tomorrow Future Talks – a live streamed Event & Q+A giving you front row access to the people transforming the world through technology.
Today we’ll be exploring how we can design for a sustainable future.
You’ll be hearing from environmental activist and founder of GROW, George Lamb alongside Solve for Tomorrow mentors Taz Latif, Andriana Lagoudes, Reuben Christian and expert guests:

Want to ask a questions live?
Join the Solve for Tomorrow Community on Discord and submit your questions directly to the experts via our #sustainability channel.
